timeline.author: wing328
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -178,7 +178,7 @@ public void testToYamlStringMinimalExample() throws Exception {
                 "      description: Some description\n" +
                 "      operationId: pingOp\n" +
                 "      responses:\n" +
-                "        200:\n" +
+                "        \"200\":\n" +

replies.bodyText: Can't we convert it before consuming?
replies.author: etherealjoy

replies.bodyText: We can but someone may have already processed these numeric status codes in their app and this change may break their app. To fix it, the users need to do the conversion.
replies.author: wing328
jimschubert

replies.bodyText: I believe YAML keys are always considered strings, so someone parsing this manually through YAML should be unaffected. We could verify in YAML spec, but probably lower priority than fixing a bug that makes the doc non-compliant with the spec.
replies.author: jimschubert

replies.bodyText: OK. Let's go ahead with this change. I'll update the samples after the merge.
replies.author: wing328
